item.title: Pressed Juicery CEO on Retail Expansion Strategy
item.description: Justin Nedelman, Pressed Juicery CEO, says the company tested its wellness smoothie at Costco before going national and saw strong results. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” t
